Verses: 1 needhimaangale, Karththarukkul Kalikoorungal; Thudhiseyvadhu Semmaiyaanavargalukkuth Thagum.
2 suramandalaththinaal Karththaraith Thudhiththu, Paththu Narambu Veenaiyinaalum Avaraik Keerththanampannungal.
3 avarukkup Pudhuppaattaip Paadungal; Aanandha Saththaththode Vaaththiyangalai Nerththiyaai Vaasiyungal.
4 karththarudaiya Vaarththai Uththamamum, Avarudaiya Seygaiyellaam Saththiyamumaayirukkiradhu.
5 avar Needhiyilum Niyaayaththilum Piriyappadugiraar; Boomi Karththarudaiya Kaaruniyaththinaal Niraindhirukkiradhu.
6 karththarudaiya Vaarththaiyinaal Vaanangalum, Avarudaiya Vaayin Suvaasaththinaal Avaigalin Sarvasenaiyum Undaakkappattadhu.
7 avar Samuththira Jalangalaik Kuviyalaakach Serththu, Aazhamaana Jalangalaip Pokkishavaippaaga Vaikkiraar.
8 boomiyellaam Karththarukkup Bayappaduvadhaaga; Ulagaththilulla Kudigalellaam Avarukku Anjiyiruppadhaaga.
9 avar Solla Aagum, Avar Kattalaiyita Nirkum.
10 karththar Jaadhigalin Aalosanaiyai Virudhaavaakki, Janangaludaiya Ninaivukalai Avamaakkugiraar.
11 karththarudaiya Aalosanai Niththiyakaalamaagavum, Avarudaiya Irudhayaththin Ninaivugal Thalaimurai Thalaimuraiyaagavum Nirkum.
12 karththaraith Thangalukkuth Dheyvamaagakkonda Jaadhiyum, Avar Thamakkuch Sudhandharamaagath Therindhukonda Janamum Baakkiyamulladhu.
13 karththar Vaanaththilirundhu Nokkip Paarththu, Ellaa Manupuththiraraiyum Kaangiraar.
14 thaam Vaasamaayirukkira Sthaanaththilirundhu Boomiyin Kudigal Ellaarmelum Kannokkamaayirukkiraar.
15 avargaludaiya Irudhayangalaiyellaam Avar Uruvaakki, Avargal Seygaigalaiyellaam Gavaniththirukkiraar.
16 endha Raajaavum Than Senaiyin Migudhiyaal Ratchikkappataan; Savuriyavaanum Than Balaththin Migudhiyaal Thappaan.
17 ratchikkiradharkuk Kudhirai Virudhaa; Adhu Than Migundha Veeriyaththaal Thappuviyaadhu.
18 thamakkup Bayandhu, Thamadhu Kirubaikkuk Kaaththirukkiravargalin Aaththumaakkalai Maranaththirku Vilakki Viduvikkavum;
19 panjaththil Avargalai Uyirodekaakkavum, Karththarudaiya Kan Avargalmel Nokkamaayirukkiradhu.
20 nammudaiya Aaththumaa Karththarukkuk Kaaththirukkiradhu; Avare Namakkuth Thunaiyum Namakkuk Kedagamumaanavar.
21 avarudaiya Parisuththa Naamaththai Naam Nambiyirukkirapadiyaal, Nammudaiya Irudhayam Avarukkul Kalikoorum.
22 karththaave, Naangal Ummai Nambiyirukkirapadiye Umadhu Kirubai Engalmel Iruppadhaaga.
